conditions.short_description: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.
conditions.full_description: No recent avalanches reported and there is little existing snow. Avalanche risk in the mountains in the North and Eastfjords will increase with new snow this week.

area_forecast.weather: Lítilsháttar slydda og snjókoma til fjalla á mánudag og hægur vindur.

area_forecast.forecast: There is no existing base layer of snow. On Tuesday snow is expected to start to accumulate in gullies and depressions.
area_forecast.snow_condition: There is no existing base layer of snow. On Tuesday, snow will start to accumulate in gullies and depressions.
area_forecast.weather: Éljagangur í NA-átt á þriðjudaginn. Rólegt og kalt á miðvikudaginn og fimmtudaginn.

area_forecast.forecast: Considerable snow accumulation in gullies and S-SW-facing slopes in snow showers in the coming days. While there is little existing base layer present in the mountains, the new snow can trigger avalanches.
area_forecast.snow_condition: There is little base layer present in the mountains. Snow will accumulate in gullies and S-SW-facing slopes in snow showers during snowfall in strong N-NE winds on Tuesday and Wednesday.
area_forecast.weather: Éljagangur í N-NA-átt á þriðjudag og miðvikudag

area_forecast.forecast: Considerable snow accumulation in gullies and S-facing slopes in snow showers in the coming days. While there is little existing base layer present in the mountains, the new snow can trigger avalanches.
area_forecast.snow_condition: There is little base layer present in the mountains. Snow will accumulate in gullies and S-facing slopes in snow showers during snowfall in strong N-winds on Tuesday and Wednesday.
area_forecast.weather: Éljagangur til fjalla í N-átt á þriðjudag og miðvikudag en slydda á láglendi. Rólegt og kalt eftir hádegi á fimmtudag.

weather_forecast.forecast: Snow showers across the country with considerable snow accumulation in N-NE-winds in the North and Eastfjords.
